title: [Medicine] A projected 93 million US adults who are overweight and obese may be suitable for 2.4 mg dose of semaglutide, a weight loss medication. Its use could result in 43m fewer people with obesity, and prevent up to 1.5m heart attacks, strokes and other adverse cardiovascular events over 10 years.

[Medicine] COVID-19 is associated with an increased risk of developing various autoimmune diseases (such as lupus/SLE) and the risk could be reduced by COVID-19 vaccination, finds a new study of 4.2m people
